metadata.title: CVE-2015-0278 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: libuv before 0.10.34 does not properly drop group privileges, which allowscontext-dependent attackers to gain privileges via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: libuv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
